settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure GitHub Gist synchronization and preferences
settings.github_token_description: Configure your GitHub account for cloud synchronization
settings.github_token_placeholder: Enter your GitHub personal access token
settings.github_token_help: Create a token at GitHub Settings. Requires 'gist' scope.
settings.gist_id_placeholder: Enter your Gist ID or leave empty to create a new one
settings.encryption_required_description: All configurations must be encrypted before syncing to Gist. This is required for security.
settings.encryption_password_placeholder: Enter a strong password (min 8 chars, mixed case, numbers, symbols)
settings.encryption_password_warning: ⚠️ This password will encrypt all your configurations. Keep it safe and never share it!
settings.encryption_password_weak: Password too weak - needs stronger requirements
settings.about_description: MCP Sync helps you manage and synchronize Model Context Protocol (MCP) configurations across multiple programming agents on different computers.
settings.about_supported: Supported agents: Cursor, Windsurf, Claude Desktop, Qwen CLI, Zed, and Cline.
settings.about_secure: Your configurations are stored privately in GitHub Gist and synced securely with encryption.
